arts.ttl: Bukayo Saka sets Arsenal on record-breaking path with worrying Premier League omen
arts.sum: Bukayo Saka was unstoppable as Arsenal defeat West am at the London Stadium on Saturday evening and found himself adding to his goal and assist tally for the season

arts.ttl: “Beyond any of us” | West Ham set to make same mistake by signing underwhelming striker
arts.sum: West Ham’s links with Argentinian striker shows they will never learn their lesson. When you watch West Ham play, there’s one issue above all else that’s abundantly clear; they desperately need a goal scoring striker. Michail Antonio has been performing well as of late, but he’s not the player he once was and goals are... arts.ttl: “Way too easy” | West Ham brought back to reality by Arsenal thrashing
arts.sum: West Ham’s heavy defeat against Arsenal gives fans a reality check. Many had believed that West Ham’s 2-0 win over Newcastle was a sign that things had finally clicked under Julen Lopetegui – this doesn’t seem to be the case. An action packed first-half at home to Arsenal saw the visitors take the lead just... arts.ttl: Mikel Arteta issues Gabriel Magalhaes injury update: Arsenal boss reveals West Ham United injury concern
arts.sum: Mikel Arteta delivers an injury update regarding the likes of Gabriel Magalhaes and Mikel Merino following Arsenal's win against West Ham United on Saturday evening.

arts.ttl: Arteta: 7-goal first half in win vs West Ham 'crazy'
arts.sum: Mikel Arteta has described the first half of Arsenal's 5-2 win over West Ham as "crazy" after all seven goals were scored in the first 45 minutes of the game.

arts.ttl: “Would be able to” | West Ham flop’s surprise links with huge club makes sense
arts.sum: West Ham flop could secure an unlikely move to the biggest club in the world. It doesn’t matter how good you are abroad, the Premier League is a whole different ball game. Time and time again we see players who compete at the very top in other leagues fail to impress in England. Nayef Aguerd... arts.ttl: Arsenal thump West Ham in chaotic, great showcase for Premier League
arts.sum: It's hard to take too many lessons from Arsenal's 5-2 win at West Ham. Ultimately, it was a game that showed the best of the Gunners and of the Premier League.

arts.ttl: Jamie Redknapp questions Arsenal's 'strange' penalty decision during 5-2 rout of West Ham - with both Bukayo Saka and Martin Odegaard on target from the spot
arts.sum: Arsenal were awarded a second penalty on the stroke of the break after Hammers goalkeeper Likas Fabianski was penalised for a punch on Gabriel, with Saka converting from the spot.

arts.ttl: Huge brawl breaks out as punches thrown during West Ham vs Arsenal in ugly scenes
arts.sum: Arsenal's win over West Ham was marred by a huge brawl breaking out among Hammers fans as their team fell four goals down with punches being thrown before stewards moved in
